# UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the color range of the image renderer context.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Range
```

## Constants

- **UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range.automatic**: The system automatically chooses the image renderer context’s pixel format according to the color range of its content.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range.extended**: The image renderer context supports wide color.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range.standard**: The image renderer context doesn’t support extended colors.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range.unspecified**: The image renderer context doesn’t specify a color range.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring the renderer attributes

- **opaque**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the underlying Core Graphics context has an alpha channel.
- **scale**: The display scale of the image renderer context.
- **preferredRange**: The preferred color range of the image renderer context.
- **prefersExtendedRange**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the bitmap context uses extended color.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
